JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description:   As a member of the Software Engineering team, you will:      be part of a specialist software development team that works on cloud based mission-critical applications.    design, develop and test easy to use, efficient, responsive, consistently predictable user interfaces that will be the hallmark of our solutions.    demonstrate a high degree of creativity and latitude while envisioning innovative system features and functionality.    provide your expertise in the entire SDLC, from Design to UAT.    enrich yourself and the team via continual research of new technologies and products.    help strengthen the quality of our growing team by introducing suitable new talent via your personal & professional networks.      Requirements:     Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject.    2+ years of hands on experience in designing and developing applications using Java EE core technologies.    Familiar with Object Oriented analysis and design using common design patterns.    Must have experience in developing web applications using Angular JS / JSF / Spring MVC.    Must have hands on experience with JQuery, CSS3.0, HTML5.    Proficient in Relational Databases, SQL, and ORM technologies (MyBatis, Hibernate).    Experience with test-driven development (JUnit).
